categoryDescriptions.Business: Operations, compliance, and process improvement work from 13+ years in manufacturing. These cards represent the systems and workflows I've learnt, built or improved to keep businesses running efficiently.
categoryDescriptions.Web/App Dev: Self-taught development skills applied to real problems. From internal tools to public-facing apps, I build software that solves specific operational challenges.
categoryDescriptions.CAD: Design work spanning product development, shop drawings, and custom fabrication projects. I use CAD to validate a concept before issues are found during production.
categoryDescriptions.Technology: Personal tech projects including home infrastructure, custom builds, and the kind of tinkering that keeps my problem-solving skills sharp.
categoryDescriptions.DIY: Hands-on projects. Building things with my hands gives me perspective that translates directly to understanding manufacturing processes. Plus it's fun!

projects.title: Sam Haughey
projects.description: Operations Manager with 13+ years in manufacturing. I build systems that work and apps that solve real problems.
projects.longDescription: I've spent over a decade turning operational chaos into streamlined systems — from factory floors to ERP platforms to custom-built tools. I'm equally comfortable in a spreadsheet, a codebase, or a workshop.

skills.title: Operations & Manufacturing
skills.blurb: From raw materials to finished goods — I manage the entire production lifecycle. ERP systems, inventory, scheduling, and supplier relationships that keep factories running smoothly.

skills.title: Quality & Compliance
skills.blurb: Building products that meet standards and pass audits. ISO 9001, industry certifications, health & safety systems, and traceability that protects both the business and customers.

skills.title: Finance & Costing
skills.blurb: Making sure the numbers work. Product costing, margin analysis, demand forecasting, and financial reporting that drives profitable decision-making.
items: Xero for operational reporting & audit prep

skills.title: Software & Automation
skills.blurb: When off-the-shelf doesn't cut it, I build it. React apps, database backends, workflow automation, and scripts that eliminate repetitive work.
items: myMECA: React app with 250+ daily users

skills.title: Technical & Design
skills.blurb: Bridging the gap between concept and reality. CAD modelling, graphic design, prototyping, and the technical infrastructure that supports it all.

projects.title: myMECA
projects.description: Healthcare payroll calculator used by 250+ nurses daily. Built with React and Supabase to decode the NZNO-HNZ collective agreement. This was my first public facing app with login, subscriptions, a complex bucketing system for rostered hours that respect the NZNO-HNZ agreement. Lots of learnings but positive community feedback has kept me motivated.

projects.title: ERP & Accounting Integration
projects.description: Day-to-day management of Unleashed ERP and Xero accounting. Inventory control, BOM management, purchase orders, and financial reporting for a Tier 1 IFRS entity.

projects.title: ISO 9001 Quality Management
projects.description: 10+ years developing and maintaining quality management systems to achieve and retain ISO 9001 certification across multiple audit cycles.

projects.title: Sign Pricing Calculator
projects.description: Complex pricing tool handling material nesting calculations, tier-based pricing structures, and quote generation for photoluminescent signage products.

projects.title: FMA Audit
projects.description: 10+ years operating in a Tier 1 FMA reporting entity, playing a key role in preparing for and passing annual audits.

projects.title: Process Optimisation
projects.description: Streamlining manufacturing workflows, reducing waste, and implementing quality systems across production lines.

projects.title: Illustrator Automation
projects.description: Custom Adobe Illustrator scripts automating sign manufacturing workflows at Ecoglo. Batch processing, layout generation, and production-ready file prep that saves hours of manual work.

projects.title: Costing & Forecasting
projects.description: Building pricing models, procurement systems, and demand forecasting tools for manufacturing operations.

projects.title: CodeMark
projects.description: Managing production of a CodeMarked product for NZ and AU markets. Covers procurement, initial certification, and ongoing monitoring audits.
